text: Héctor Enrique Olivares (18 February 1958 − 12 May 2019) was an Argentine politician, engineer and agricultural producer. He was a member of the Radical Civic Union (UCR). He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2015 until his death in 2019. He was born in La Rioja. On 9 May 2019, Olivares and his adviser, Miguel Marcelo Yadón, were badly injured after being shot in Buenos Aires. The men were taken to a nearby hospital, where Yadón was pronounced dead. Olivares died of his injuries on 12 May 2019, three days after the attack. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine politicians Category:Assassinated people Category:Argentine engineers Category:Murders by firearm
title: Héctor Enrique Olivares
